text: Ravi Shankar Prasad is an Indian lawyer, politician and the current Union Minister holding the Ministry of Law and Justice, Communications and Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology portfolios in the Government of India. He is a leader of BJP. In 2018 according to The Economic Times he features among the top twenty influential world leaders in digital technology and e-government. == References == Category:Bihari politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Indian lawyers Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Ravi Shankar Prasad
